entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
